org.libvirt
Class ErrorHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.libvirt.ErrorHandler

public class ErrorHandler
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class which processes the last error from the libvirt library. It turns errors into Libvirt Exceptions.

Author:
bkearney
